title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3619/85 of 20 December 1985 re-establishing the levying of customs duties applicable to artificial corundum falling within subheading 28.20 B originating in Brazil, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3562/84 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3619/85
of 20 December 1985
re-establishing the levying of customs duties applicable to artificial corundum falling within subheading 28.20 B originating in Brazil, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3562/84 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
As from 24 December 1985, the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3562/84, shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the following products originating in Brazil:
1.2 //  //  // CCT heading No  // Description  //  //  // 28.20 B (NIMEXE 28.20-30)   // Artificial corundum  //    //

This Regulation shall enter into foce on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1985.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 338, 27. 12. 1984, p. 1.
